p:
The presence of
Heracleum sosnowskyi
invasive plants in the northern forest-tundra subzone (66.0000Â°N) was confirmed by field observation on the territory of Inta city (Komi Republic).
Heracleum sosnowskyi
plants formed monostand and showed high enough seed productivity (up to 12 000 seeds per plant) in this area.
